snippet.title: SEGA Genesis Mini | Genesis Does
snippet.description:
The SEGA Genesis turns 30 years young today! To celebrate, we recreated one of our iconic commercials from that era with a nod towards the upcoming release of the SEGA Genesis Mini.

Tell us what "Genesis Does" means to you: Sega.com/mystory

That's right, we loved hearing your Genesis and Mega Drive stories so much that we're celebrating this big anniversary by extending the video submission deadline to August 21.

genesismini.sega.com
